components.description: Schwinn 'N Litened aluminum with Comfort Tuned ULTRA Geometry and LCG (low Center of Gravity) design. Epicenter seat stays and rack and WB bosses
Pro Wheel alloy arm with 33 tooth steel chain ring and double chain guard
Comfort Tuned Resin with TPR insert
Alloy 60 degree with 180mm quill insertion and removable cap.
Schwinn Comfort Tuned Ultra with coil spring suspension
